title: Simple circuits - effect of switches A B C on bulb

One of the bulbs is labeled “Bulb <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math>.” Initially, all three switches are closed and all six bulbs are lit. A student wants to turn off Bulb <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> by opening only one switch. Opening which switch, if any, will cause bulb <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> to turn off?
